oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assessing the sustainability of EU organic and low input dairy farms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leach, Katharine
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
Systems research and participatory research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The EU funded Sustainable Organic and Low Input Dairy Systems project (SOLID), aims to support the improvement of sustainable production on organic and low input dairy farms. 10 farms in each of 9 countries participated in an initial interview based assessment. The article presents some results from the UK (Ten OMSCo and seven Calon Wen farms), Austria, Finland and Den-mark. Other countries - Romania, Italy, Spain, Greece and the Netherlands - are also involved in the project, but since these countries have very different production systems from the UK they are not covered in this article
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leach, Katharine (2012) Assessing the sustainability of EU organic and low input dairy farms. Organic Research Centre Bulletin, 2012, 111 (Winter), pp. 9-10.
